name: Feather (itch) (wallmasterr)
description:
Feather  was made in a night for the midsummerjam  run at Abertay university sponcerd by weave. 

I knew i could only put 1 nights work in so limited scope and made a simple experience.

You play as a feather freshly dislodged from a swans tail feather during a migration.  There are 2 objectives, 

ether try to stay in the air for as long as possible with updrafts of wind and poassing migrating birds to help you stay up.

or

try to reach the water as quickly as possible.

Nither of these objectives are enforced, its up to the player to decide what they want to do.

any button to start
wasd to move
r to restart esc to exit

Made with free open source software
blender(modeling, animation , game engine, texting) , krita ( transparent textures), audacity(audio)

The music in the bg is the theme for the jam.
